sources.title: Creepshow 2 (1983)
sources.description: Creepshow 2 is a 1987 American comedy horror anthology film directed by Michael Gornick, and the sequel to Creepshow. ThisÂ  horror anthology film featuring three stories: "Old Chief Wood'nhead," where a wooden Indian statue comes to life to avenge the murder of a couple; "The Raft," about college students who encounter a deadly blob while swimming; and "The Hitchhiker," which follows a woman who is haunted by a hitchhiker she accidentally hits with her car. The film combines elements of horror and dark comedy, with a wraparound story featuring a character known as the Creep.
